text: Decent church, the ground floor is a confusion with cars, pedestrian, event halls, food, and lifts to the second floor where the main praying hall is located. A small space that can contain hundreds of people. The Chapel is cozy. I came here to attend a nephew's wedding. Both very committed Christian. Wish they have wonderful children and complete the family.
Beautiful and cozy church! Attended two weddings here:)

I remembered attending a wedding at this place. It was on 9 July 2022 where I witnessed the marriage of Lewis Poh and Grace Ang. The management planned the wedding so flawlessly. Everyone really had a good time during the wedding here.
Warm and welcoming place. Lots of young and middle aged people. Also old folks  and young family members with toddlers too. Good mixture of different age groups.

The staff here are so warm and helpful! Will be holding my wedding here in July and they've been very helpful with the questions I've had. Also, the sanctuary is beautiful, really excited for the big day! :)
